items.sentence: If you stay with the company until the end of the year, you will receive a bonus.
The man that I talked to on the bus said that he'd been to Australia three times.
To the man who only has a hammer in the toolkit, every problem looks like a nail.
I spend about half my time trying to convince Tom to do what he's supposed to do.
Tom couldn't open the door because something was blocking it from the other side.
